Modification	
Reverse engineering and modification of our software are not permitted.

Distribution	
Please contact us if you would like to reproduce our software to other networks. Free distribution of our software for the purpose listed below is permitted.

Purpose	
Our software may be used for the purpose of personal or evaluating use only. Business or commercial uses are not permitted.

Warranty	
Universal Computer Laboratory Co., Ltd. makes no warranty of our software for any purpose.

Support	
Universal Computer Laboratory Co., Ltd. provides no product support for our software. If you have any questions or comments, please address them through e-mail.
